name: Google - Blue and flat all over header complement
description: A simple style for google which just effect the header. It's meant to complement the more worked-through theme: "Youtube - Blue and flat all over". It should work for all country specific urls of google
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);


@-moz-document  url-prefix("http://www.google"),
                url-prefix("https://images.google"),
                url-prefix("httsp://news.google"),
                url-prefix("https://blogsearch.google"),
                url-prefix("https://books.google"),
                url-prefix("https://209.85.165.104"),
                url-prefix("https://translate.google"),
                url-prefix("https://video.google"), 
                url-prefix("https://encrypted.google"),
                url-prefix("https://www.google"), 
                url-prefix("https://maps.google"),

				domain("google.com"),
				domain("google.ca"),
				domain("google.cn"),
				domain("google.com.pk"),
				domain("google.com.tw"),
				domain("google.co.in"),
				domain("google.ru"),
				domain("google.co.uk"),
				domain("google.co.jp"),
				domain("google.com.au"),
				domain("google.co.nz"),
				domain("google.com.sa"),
				domain("google.com.tr"),
				domain("google.nl"),
				domain("google.fr"),
				domain("google.co.th"),
				domain("google.it"),
				domain("google.gr"),
				domain("google.com.vn"),
				domain("google.be"),
				domain("google.com.mx"),
				domain("google.de"),
				domain("google.com.my"),
				domain("google.pl"),
				domain("google.com.hk"),
				domain("google.co.kr"),
				domain("google.co.za"),
				domain("google.co.il"),
				domain("google.dk"),
				domain("google.com.cu"),
				domain("google.cz"),
				domain("google.cl"),
				domain("google.com.sg"),
				domain("google.ch"),
				domain("google.com.co"),
				domain("google.hu"),
				domain("google.co.id"),
				domain("google.es"),
				domain("google.com.ua"),
				domain("google.se"),
				domain("google.com.pr"),
				domain("google.com.ca"),
				domain("google.com.ch"),
				domain("google.fi"),
				domain("google.lv"),
				domain("google.co.hu"),
				domain("google.lk"),
				domain("gmale.com"),
				domain("google.ro"),
				domain("google.kz"),
				domain("google.by"),
				domain("google.pt"),
				domain("google.com.br"),
				domain("google.vc"),
				domain("google.tm"),
				domain("google.bg"),
				domain("google.ie"),
				domain("google.co.ck"),
				domain("google.com.om"),
				domain("google.mu"),
				domain("google.com.ph"),
				domain("google.com.jm")
{

.gbzt, .gbtsa {color: #1BBC9B !important;}
.gbts:hover {color: white !important;} 
#gbx3 {background: #2D3E50 !important;border-color: #2D3E50 !Important;}
.gbma {border-top-color: #1bbc9b !important;}

}
